title: Gunners want Leicester prodigy
text:
Arsenal interested in Leicester's Terell Pennant By Sky Sports News HQ   3:23pm Arsene Wenger and Arsenal are reportedly interested in Terell Pennant Arsenal are planning to put in an offer for Leicester's highly-rated 14-year-old prospect Terell Pennant, according to Sky sources. 
Pennant has trained with Leicester's first-team squad but he does not have a contract beyond the end of the season and Manchester United are among the other clubs interested. 
The youngster scored both goals for Leicester's U16 side in a recent game against Southampton and Arsenal scouts were in attendance for Leicester's 2-1 victory. 
And the Gunners are now believed to be preparing an offer for a player regarded as one of the most exciting teenage talents in the country. Also See:
